ygData.subject: Re: Petition....
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh Druids still have some use to a group though :). Necros just plain suck in groups they have nothing good to a group. If they do this it will just make it
ygData.messageBody:
Heh Druids still have some use to a group though :). Necros just plain suck in groups they have nothing good to a group. If they do this it will just make it worse.

Naeeldar
-----Original Message-----
From: The Baron <cwood5@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, August 26, 1999 5:15 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Petition....


Yep the Druids are lossing it over this one, I have a High level Druid as well and if they do go through with this then that class will be pretty much worthless, However on a Side note, they are trying to weaken the Necro pets as well, I see this as equaly nuts, Granted our DOT's are great but our DD's are kinda Blah, Nerf the pet and we die easy, you may want to include the pet Issue as well.
----- Original Message -----
From: Naeeldar
To: eq_necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, August 26, 1999 4:30 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Petition....


I pulled this off a druid list I think everybody should sign it.

"I am going to send an email to the eqdruids.com webmaster and ask him to start a
petition to STOP the anti-kiting patch. PLEASE, everyone who is a druid player go
to the website and sign the petition. Verant has many more much more important
things to fix than this. I will post here when the petition is up at eqdruids.com.

Thanks to one and all.

Ldiin - Erollisi Marr"

Naeeldar
